paragraphs.name: 9a97
paragraphs.text: Actually, all the conclusions in this article are incorrect. Lebron beclowned himself in all the above interactions, save perhaps the one where he was arguing with another clown: Lavar Ball.

1ceeb07f2a6.title: Actually, all the conclusions in this article are incorrect.

paragraphs.name: 4fbb
paragraphs.text: LeBron James is about to enter #ZeroDark23 mode — The hashtag wouldn’t have worked as well when he was wearing no. 6.

paragraphs.name: 0c6a
paragraphs.text: This is why JLit, despite loving Chandler Parsons TOO much, remains one of my favorites on Simmons’ team.

c72ed8604286.title: This is why JLit, despite loving Chandler Parsons TOO much, remains one of my favorites on Simmons…

paragraphs.name: fd6d
paragraphs.text: LeBron is a selfish prick. We should not be advocating his apathy for screwing over the fans by falsely advertising a game. Also, the science is far from secure on the position of rest. Just ask all the NFL teams that had first round byes in the playoffs and lost the following week. We should not be condoning their selfish behavior. They’re acting like spoiled celebrities
lavar ball can go fuck himself

c5bb83d7ecd1.title: lavar ball can go fuck himself

paragraphs.name: 620e
paragraphs.text: Juliet! You are a great editor, but it’s lovely to see you write now and then. With all the Ringer / ESPN crossover, maybe we can get a Food News throwback pod some time pretty please? :)

f97bb410801c.title: Juliet! You are a great editor, but it’s lovely to see you write now and then.

paragraphs.name: 4bc1
paragraphs.text: Don’t see the love for him. Lebron just being a corny drama queen as always. It’s saying something that “#ZeroDark23” is about the 10th corniest thing he’s done in the last couple of years, and doesn’t even register on the list of overly dramatic moments.

9403f0a157fa.title: Don’t see the love for him.

paragraphs.text: I’d love to get an off-the-record take from Juliet on LaVar Ball
